price: Gooftaa kiyya! Anaaf, araarami abbaafi haadha kiyyaafis, nama mu’umina ta'ee mana kiyya seeneefis, mu'uminootaafi mu'umintittiifis (araarami). Kaafirootaaf badii malee hin dabalin.”
arabic: رَّبِّ ٱغۡفِرۡ لِي وَلِوَٰلِدَيَّ وَلِمَن دَخَلَ بَيۡتِيَ مُؤۡمِنٗا وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارَۢا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: rabbi igh'fir lī waliwālidayya waliman dakhala baytiya mu'minan walil'mu'minīna wal-mu'mināti walā tazidi al-ẓālimīna illā tabāran
